p: Three dried samples each weighing 20 g were hydro‐distilled for 3 h using the Clevenger apparatus. EO content was determined on the basis of dry matter (ml/100 D.M.). The removal of moisture from EOs was performed by adding 0.5 g sodium sulfate and then keeping in dark vials at 4°C until the time of analysis (Dianat, Saharkhiz, & Tavassolian, 2016).
